articles.author: Rajesh Roy
articles.title: India and Pakistan again teeter on the brink of conflict over Kashmir. Here’s why - AP News
articles.description: A deadly attack on tourists in Indian-controlled Kashmir has again moved India and Pakistan closer to war. The rivals have downgraded their diplomatic and trade ties, closed their main border crossing and revoked visas for each other’s nationals. Pakistan den…
articles.content: NEW DELHI (AP) A deadly attack on tourists in Indian-controlled Kashmir has again moved India and Pakistan closer to war as the two rivals downgraded diplomatic and trade ties, closed the main border… [+6524 chars]
